column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I was traveling on vacation a few months ago , and decided to take a train to my destination instead of flying .
#text=I have always wanted to travel by train , and this was a good opportunity .
#text=I went online to look at the train schedules .
#text=There were quite a lot of them , so it took me a while to narrow down my choices based on when I wanted to leave and then arrive at my vacation destination .
#text=I finally was able to choose a time and date , and I purchased my tickets with my credit card .
#text=The day finally arrived to take my vacation .
#text=I went to the train station and checked in with the railway .
#text=They gave me a paper ticket , which I then brought to the rail line .
#text=When we boarded the train , we gave the ticket to a ticket taker , and he escorted me to my booth .
#text=Finally after all the passengers were on board , we were off .
#text=The train seemed a bit jerky in the motion , but eventually it smoothed out .
#text=It was so much fun , seeing all of the towns and cities we passed through .
#text=Some we stopped at and some we just passed through .
#text=People would get on and off when we stopped .
#text=I was able to purchase some food in a car that sold sandwiches .
#text=I slept some in my car , which was a bit uncomfortable , but I did n't mind .
#text=Before I knew it , we had arrived at my vacation destination .
#text=I was really glad that I had taken a train , and was able to see a lot of our beautiful country .
